channel.title: Wales on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Wales on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Off to Wales
item.description:
Took Blu to Area M Custom Engineering Ltd to get Beds fitted, these bed are seat during the day and fold down into a double bed, the have seat belts and are crash tested.

We also went to Taunton Leisure Bristol and I bought a pair of Altberg boots.

Area M Custom Engineering Ltd Unit 21 Burnett Ind Est Cox’s Green Wrington North Somerset BS40 5QR
